summary: A Confederate Major and his troops are falsely led to believe the Civil War is not over, and become wanted men after they attack a Union Army wagon train in Nevada.
cast: Randolph Scott|Donna Reed|Claude Jarman Jr.|Frank Faylen|Glenn Langan|Richard Denning|Lee Marvin|Jeanette Nolan|Clem Bevans|Ray Teal|Guinn 'Big Boy' Williams|Monte Blue|John Call|Edward Earle|Frank Hagney|Reed Howes|Post Park|Frank Yaconelli
keywords: outlaw gang|fight in the rain|leather jacket|leather|jacket
title: Los forasteros
